SC_LOOP.description: switch between single_site, DCA, and CDMFT

N.description: Number of imaginary time discretization points

NMATSUBARA.description: Number of matsubara frequency discretization points

t.description: Hopping element for semi circular & square lattice density of states

tprime.description: Next-nearest Hopping element for square lattice density of states

t_flavor.description: Hopping for mass imbalance for second orbital

L.description: Number of Brillouin zone points for square lattice integration

Tmax.description: required by base class: max wait time between checking if finished

Tmin.description: required by base class: min wait time between checking if finished

ATOMIC.description: Generate atomic G0 to start from

DOSFILE.description: File contaning table of Density of States

TWODBS.description: Use Hilbert transform for two-dimensional band structure

SELFCONSISTENCY_CONVERGENCE.description: Difference in Green's function at which the iteration is converged

RELAX_RATE.description: Convergence acceleration (or deceleration) parameter. Choose 1 if unsure.

SPIN_SYMMETRIZATION.description: symmetrize 'up' and 'down' spins after each solver call.

G0_OMEGA_INPUT.description: Location of the input G0 file

G0_OMEGA_OUTPUT.description: Location of the output G0 file for continuing iterations

INITIAL_G0.description: choose ISOLATED or FREE for initial G0s

IMBALANCE.description: set to true for mass imbalance simulation

PHASE.description: set to true for simulation with phase

LATTICE_LIBRARY.description: name of the xml cluster defintion file

LATTICE_DUMP.description: name of the cluster transformer hdf5 dump file

L.description: linear discretization of cluster k-point integration

NSELF.description: number of points for self-energy measurement

RECOMPUTE_INTERVAL.description: Interval after which the entire matrix is recomputed to guard against roundoff errors

KMAX.description: Size of precomputed matrix for fastupdate

NFLIP.description: number of spin flip updates per insertion update

THERMALIZATION.description: number of Monte Carlo thermalization steps

START_SLICES.description: number of randomly distributed points to start from

N_OMEGA_MEAS.description: do we measure in frequency space or in time space?
